VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc TCM Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc TCM Hospital is arc {Tertiary General Hospital}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Emergency Medical Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Emergency Medical Center is arc {Mental Health Hospital}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Emergency Medical Center} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {TCM Hospital} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from TCM Hospital to Emergency Medical Center in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Tertiary General Hospital to TCM Hospital in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Tertiary General Hospital and Emergency Medical Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Tertiary General Hospital and Emergency Medical Center is {253}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Emergency Medical Center and Tertiary General Hospital in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Emergency Medical Center and Tertiary General Hospital is {206}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Emergency Medical Center?
SC.A: The total flow output from Emergency Medical Center is {1000}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by TCM Hospital?
SC.A: The total flow input by TCM Hospital is {917}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 398? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {437} from {Emergency Medical Center} to {TCM Hospital}, a flow of {421} from {TCM Hospital} to {Emergency Medical Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 229? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {206} from {Tertiary General Hospital} to {Emergency Medical Center}, a flow of {170} from {TCM Hospital} to {Mental Health Hospital}, a flow of {133} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {TCM Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 262 and 328? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {310} from {Emergency Medical Center} to {Mental Health Hospital}, a flow of {271} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Emergency Medical Center}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from TCM Hospital to Emergency Medical Center or from Mental Health Hospital to Emergency Medical Center?
NC.A: The flow from {TCM Hospital} to {Emergency Medical Center} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Emergency Medical Center to TCM Hospital, from Tertiary General Hospital to Emergency Medical Center, or from Mental Health Hospital to TCM Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Emergency Medical Center} to {TCM Hospital} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Emergency Medical Center}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Emergency Medical Center} and {TCM Hospital}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc TCM Hospital, Arc Emergency Medical Center, Arc Tertiary General Hospital, Arc Mental Health Hospital}.
